content:
A desk lamp with a USB port is super convenient, especially if you have limited outlets or prefer to keep your devices charged while you work.

And yay for the new area rug! A lighter-colored rug can really make a big impact on the overall brightness and ambiance of a room. It's amazing how a simple change like that can freshen up the space and make it feel more welcoming. Did you choose a specific style or material for the new rug, or was it more of a spontaneous decision?

By the way, since you mentioned you've rearranged your bedroom furniture, I'm curious: how's the new layout working out for you? Are you enjoying the new configuration, or are there any tweaks you're still making?
